description: Plan step explanation seeds for PlanStepExplainer DSPy module compilation

seeds.step_summary: Attend party at Bob's house
seeds.recent_memories:
- Bob invited me to a party tonight
- Carol mentioned she'll also be attending
- Haven't seen many neighbors lately
seeds.gold_explanation: Attending Bob's party helps build neighborhood connections and strengthens existing friendships with Carol.

seeds.step_summary: Water the vegetable beds
seeds.recent_memories:
- Garden looked dry yesterday
- Tomatoes are starting to ripen
- Dave asked about the garden's progress
seeds.gold_explanation: Regular watering ensures the vegetables stay healthy and productive, supporting the community garden project.

seeds.step_summary: Explore the new neighborhood park
seeds.recent_memories:
- Heard about a new park opening nearby
- Alice mentioned it has interesting paths
- Looking for something new to do
seeds.gold_explanation: Exploring the new park offers excitement and discovery, perfectly aligned with seeking daily adventures.

seeds.step_summary: Practice pour-over technique at home
seeds.recent_memories:
- Read about new brewing ratios
- Last attempt was too bitter
- Ordered fresh beans yesterday
seeds.gold_explanation: Practicing pour-over with fresh beans helps refine technique and improve coffee quality.

seeds.step_summary: Morning jog around the neighborhood
seeds.recent_memories:
- Missed yesterday's workout
- Weather is perfect today
- Want to maintain weekly exercise goal
seeds.gold_explanation: A morning jog maintains fitness routine and takes advantage of ideal weather conditions.

seeds.step_summary: Chat with neighbors at the cafe
seeds.recent_memories:
- Haven't caught up with Emma in a while
- Cafe is usually busy in the morning
- Want to learn more about new residents
seeds.gold_explanation: Morning cafe visits create natural opportunities for casual conversations and meeting new neighbors.

seeds.step_summary: Paint at the scenic overlook
seeds.recent_memories:
- Light conditions are best in morning
- Need to practice perspective
- Overlook has beautiful views
seeds.gold_explanation: The scenic overlook offers ideal lighting and subjects for practicing landscape painting techniques.

seeds.step_summary: Join pickup basketball game at park
seeds.recent_memories:
- Saw people playing yesterday
- Haven't played basketball in months
- Looking for active social activities
seeds.gold_explanation: Joining the basketball game combines physical activity with social interaction and spontaneous fun.

seeds.step_summary: Read at the quiet library corner
seeds.recent_memories:
- Library is less crowded in afternoons
- Currently reading Pride and Prejudice
- Need uninterrupted time to focus
seeds.gold_explanation: The quiet library provides the peaceful environment needed for focused reading and comprehension.

seeds.step_summary: Visit specialty coffee shop for research
seeds.recent_memories:
- Barista there won regional competitions
- Want to learn about extraction times
- Experimenting with different beans
seeds.gold_explanation: Learning from expert baristas accelerates skill development and provides professional insights.

seeds.step_summary: Check on the herb section
seeds.recent_memories:
- Basil needs regular pruning
- Charlie mentioned pests last week
- Want to ensure herbs are thriving
seeds.gold_explanation: Regular checks help catch problems early and ensure the herb garden remains productive for the community.

seeds.step_summary: Help neighbor move furniture
seeds.recent_memories:
- Bob asked for help this afternoon
- Good chance to strengthen friendship
- Haven't spent much time with Bob lately
seeds.gold_explanation: Helping Bob move furniture demonstrates reliability and deepens their friendship through shared effort.

seeds.step_summary: Attend yoga class at wellness center
seeds.recent_memories:
- Class schedule changed to afternoons
- Instructor teaches great flexibility techniques
- Part of weekly fitness routine
seeds.gold_explanation: Regular yoga classes improve flexibility and balance, essential components of overall health and wellness.

seeds.step_summary: Try new restaurant downtown
seeds.recent_memories:
- Restaurant just opened this week
- Reviews mention unique fusion cuisine
- Looking for new experiences
seeds.gold_explanation: Trying the new restaurant satisfies curiosity and adds culinary adventure to the day.

seeds.step_summary: Sketch trees at the botanical garden
seeds.recent_memories:
- Need to practice drawing tree structures
- Botanical garden has diverse species
- Instructor emphasized studying forms
seeds.gold_explanation: Sketching diverse tree structures at the botanical garden builds foundational skills for landscape painting.

seeds.step_summary: Discuss book club selection at cafe
seeds.recent_memories:
- Book club meeting scheduled today
- Finished The Great Gatsby yesterday
- Prepared discussion notes
seeds.gold_explanation: Book club discussions deepen understanding of literature and connect reading with social engagement.

seeds.step_summary: Compost food scraps at garden
seeds.recent_memories:
- Compost bin needs turning
- Collected kitchen scraps this week
- Composting improves soil quality
seeds.gold_explanation: Regular composting enriches garden soil and supports sustainable gardening practices.

seeds.step_summary: Test cold brew method at home
seeds.recent_memories:
- Read about cold brew extraction
- Bought coarse-ground beans
- Want to compare with hot brewing
seeds.gold_explanation: Experimenting with cold brew expands brewing repertoire and develops comparative tasting skills.

seeds.step_summary: Join group fitness class at gym
seeds.recent_memories:
- New instructor started this week
- Emma said classes are motivating
- Prefer group workouts over solo exercise
seeds.gold_explanation: Group fitness classes combine social interaction with structured exercise, making workouts more enjoyable.

seeds.step_summary: Check on elderly neighbor Mrs. Chen
seeds.recent_memories:
- Mrs. Chen mentioned feeling lonely
- Haven't visited in a few days
- She enjoys afternoon tea
seeds.gold_explanation: Regular visits with Mrs. Chen provide companionship and strengthen meaningful intergenerational connections.

seeds.step_summary: Explore hiking trail in nearby woods
seeds.recent_memories:
- Trail map shows scenic viewpoint
- Weather perfect for hiking
- Haven't explored this area before
seeds.gold_explanation: Exploring the new trail offers physical challenge and the thrill of discovering unfamiliar natural spaces.

seeds.step_summary: Study color theory at home studio
seeds.recent_memories:
- Struggled with color mixing last session
- Instructor recommended theory review
- Have reference materials ready
seeds.gold_explanation: Studying color theory strengthens foundational knowledge essential for realistic landscape painting.

seeds.step_summary: Morning reading session at home
seeds.recent_memories:
- Set daily reading goal of 50 pages
- Currently in Moby Dick chapter 30
- Morning mind is freshest for complex texts
seeds.gold_explanation: Consistent morning reading sessions build literary knowledge and maintain progress toward completing classics.

seeds.step_summary: Organize potluck dinner preparations
seeds.recent_memories:
- Invited 8 neighbors to potluck
- Need to prepare dining space
- Potlucks create warm community atmosphere
seeds.gold_explanation: Hosting a potluck brings neighbors together in a relaxed setting, fostering community bonds.
